title: How to match my lyrics to any rap beat - Quora

response.answer_text: its all about flow. some of the best ryhms ever the words came first, the beat comes 2nd. (rappers delight, long version, or Slick Ricks Children's Story, you can also try Force Md’s meet the Fat boys)now a days the beat track is laid down first then rapped to. Keep a dictionary or a thesaurus handy to look for alternative words that will fit the flow but still get the point/story across.. Freestyle sometimes works best, peace!

Go with the flow. Keep up with the beat. You know, try to not rap off-beat. I mean you can rap off-beat if you want ’cause most rappers do that (like Suga Free, E-40, Blueface, Common etc.) and it sounds dope but try to keep it up. Best of luck ✌.
